Class ScannerManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ScannerManager

  • public class ScannerManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Control class pertaining only to scanner Decentralises user inputs away from the other parts of the code

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private static java.util.Scanner sc
      Initialise scanner object

    • Constructor Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> createMessages​(java.lang.String message1, java.lang.String message2)
      Method to added many strings into an ArrayList of messages
      static java.lang.String stringInput​(java.lang.String message)
      Blueprint method to enact scanner functionality accepting String values message refers to the message prompted to user for input
      static int testIntInput​(java.lang.String message)
      Blueprint method to enact scanner functionality accepting Integer values, with exceptions included message refers to the message prompted to user for input
      static int testIntInput​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> messages, int lowerLimit)
      Blueprint method to enact scanner functionality accepting Integer values, with exceptions included ArrayList of messages refers to the message prompted to user for input, as well as other messages prompted after exceptions are thrown lowerLimit sets the lower boundary in which an exception will be thrown if user input an integer lower than it
      static int testIntInput​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> messages, int lowerLimit, int upperLimit)
      Overloaded method upperLimit sets the upper boundary in which an exception will be thrown if user input an integer larger than it
